title: Baler
occurrences: This story of love begins in Baler...
the Americans to set foot in Baler
...And this love story ends in Baler

Of the fifty-seven men who entered the church of Baler on June 29, 1898, only thirty-three survived the siege. Lt. Martin Cerezo and his troops surrendered to the Philippine Republican Army led by Lt. Colonel Simon Tecson
Celso Resurreccion Jr. grew up in Baler. He served in the Philippine Army during the Second World War and died in 1966.
